topic.title: Registering Your Podcast to the iTunes Podcast Directory
topic.p: This feature is used to register your podcast channel to the iTunes Podcast Directory.

ol.title: To register your Podcast Channel to the iTunes Podcast Directory:
ol.li: From your iTunes player, access the iTunes Music Store.
Click Podcasts on the left side menu, then click Submit a Podcast.

li.p: Enter the RSS feed link URL of your podcast channel in the appropriate field. You can find the URL information on the Podcast page of your Control Panel. If the podcast channel you want is expanded, continue with Step 4. If the podcast channel you want is collapsed, then click the expand symbol: The Podcast window refreshes with the channel expanded displaying information for that channel.
Note: The RSS link appears between quotation marks (") after <a href=. The following is an example of the information for the RSS Link:
The RSS feed link URL would be http://www.domain.com/podcasts/channel.rss.

ol.li: After the URL is accepted, follow the instructions to complete the registration.
